explains: v. 拆下，使分离；脱离，摆脱；派遣，分派

sentences.en: The skis should detach from the boot if you fall.
sentences.cn: 要是你跌倒了，滑雪板就该脱离靴子。

sentences.en: I tried to detach myself from the reality of these terrible events.
sentences.cn: 我尽力使自己从这些可怕事件的现实中摆脱出来。

sentences.en: They clambered back under the falls to detach the raft from a jagged rock.
sentences.cn: 他们爬回到瀑布下面以便将卡在锯齿状岩石间的小艇拉出来。
